Class MainMemoryDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.MainMemoryDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO
public class MainMemoryDAO extends Object implements DAO
Provide all data storage and retrieval operations needed by the server. MainMemoryDAO will store the serverâ€™s data in main memory (RAM) using standard data structures (maps, sets, lists)
